name: 3-methyl-2-oxobutanoate:[dihydrolipoyllysine-residue (2-methylpropanoyl)transferase] lipoyllysine 2-oxidoreductase (decarboxylating, acceptor-2-methylpropanoylating)
comment: 3-methyl-2-oxobutanoate dehydrogenase complexes:3-methyl-2-oxobutanoate dehydrogenase a part of multi-step reaction (see R01701+R02662+R07618, possibly identical to R01210) subsequently R02662 TPP-dependent enzyme (see R07599+R07600)
